humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that there are metastases in 13 out of 15 lymph nodes (13/15). Based on the new rules provided, N3 indicates metastases in 4 or more axillary lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N3.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic carcinoma in 13 out of 15 lymph nodes, as stated in the report: 'Positive (13/15)'. According to the AJCC 7th edition staging system, this would correspond to an N3 stage.
